title: Tiffany & Co. Partners with Netflix to Bejewel Guillermo del Toro’s ‘Frankenstein’ (Exclusive)
summary: Del Toro joked during a just-released featurette, "We had more security for the Tiffany pieces than for many of the stars of the film."

title: Irina Shayk Uses This $13 ‘White Truffle’ Face Serum From Amazon (It’s On Sale for Prime Day)
summary: The d'Alba Piedmont White Truffle First Spray Serum harnesses antioxidant properties of truffles to plump and nourish skin, and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
